titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which require partnerships, S corporations, and personal service corporations to adopt certain taxable years.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/22/1987--Introduced. Repeals specified provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that require partnerships, S corporations, and personal service corporations to adopt certain taxable years. Provides that the Internal Revenue Code shall be applied and administered as if such provisions had not been enacted.
